title: Slime Taoshite 300-nen, Shiranai Uchi ni Level Max ni Nattemashita
synopsis: In role-playing games, slimes are usually the easiest monster to kill, and because of that, they yield few experience points. But what would happen if you live long enough to keep defeating them for 300 years?
related_anime: ['Slime Taoshite 300-nen, Shiranai Uchi ni Level Max ni Nattemashita']
